meta_description: With free admission and a collection of diverse works of art, the Georgia Museum of Art is a place to slow down, connect, wander and wonder.
hours_text:
# Museum Field Trip in Athens

## Discover More Art, Together

[ Get Involved  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251226051837/https://georgiamuseum.org/supporter-form-start/)

# Accessibility Statement

# Accessibility Statement

# Accessibility Statement
collections_text:
### Wander Slowly, Wonder Deeply

#### A Place for Everyone

The Georgia Museum of Art is a place to pause, look closely, feel something unexpected and discover something new. Free and open 6 days a week, we welcome everyone to explore our collection of nearly 20,000 works of art.

### Wander Slowly, Wonder Deeply

#### A Place for Everyone

The Georgia Museum of Art is a place to pause, look closely, feel something unexpected and discover something new. Free and open 6 days a week, we welcome everyone to explore our collection of nearly 20,000 works of art.
